phrase: You're from flask, right? Interesting, have your friends been woken up already?
Oh, if I got caps, I'd definetly buy you and run away from here...
Perhaps, you haven't got any fun being in a flask ...
...I bet that you're still a virgin...
Ponies like you are worth their weight in gold. As soon as everypony find out about you, they will start a war for you.
